content.detailedDescription: I was in my house when i heard my dad tell me to come outside and look at a strange shape in the sky. when i went out, i saw most of my neighbors also in the street watching the strange craft. at first i thought it was a hot-air balloon (because the new mexico balloon fiesta is coming next month) but it didn't move at all and was well over 1 mile up in the air. i went inside to grab a camera and my binoculars. when i came out i noticed it was no longer orange, but a blueish white. it no longer glowed and almost seemed like a type of camouflage. i captured some footage on an hd camera. i know this wasn't a balloon because there was no evident flame inside, no basket, and it was way too high up for a balloon. i was also able to film a little using my laptop but at the time the craft was practically camouflaged and only visible with the eye or an hd camera. most likely you wont be able to see the craft on the low end footage, but it may be with careful examination. this is the first official ufo i have seen, but i have seen strange lights and have heard strange sounds around my house as well. i hope i have provided you with enough information, and that someone can help explain this strange event.
content.summary: Orange balloonish-shapped craft that remained stationary and changed colors.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight 9/13/14 about 9:30 pm driving east on shepherd rd. east of route 23 in northern pickaway county, saw two large orange spheres, one above and back from the other, that were much bigger than the size of a star, stationary, unobscured by clouds which were in the background, and well above tree line, appeared to be south of duvall rd and between bulen-pierce and ashville pike roads.  they did not blink and were clearly unusual. when i stopped my car and got out to look they disappeared into clouds which was weird because they were initially no where near the clouds, the clouds themselves were not moving, so it was like they made their own fog or something.  about a minute or two later i saw one moving like it was going to land at rickenbacker but then turn 90 deg west and seem to go down (that was weird) toward the scioto river which is a couple miles west.  i thought i saw the second orange sphere in the clouds above the flight line of the first but then it faded into the clouds.  during this time i called my fiance to tell him what i was seeing and to go outside to see it himself - that was when it initially went into the clouds so he didn't see it.  later he told me that he had seen 2 orange balls stationary in the sky near weigand and ashville pike roads earlier that week, only during the daytime around 5pm, and that as he looked at them they also faded out into what looked like fog. the coincidence of us both having almost identical visual experience is creepy.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 orange spheres that faded into clouds then appeared to west: fiance had similar experience few days prior

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my mother-in-law's porch, facing north, smoking a cigarette at approx. 22:20 est. bright blue light, super fast, no trail. passed overhead in a northerly direction. when it first entered my line of sight from over and behind, it must have been around 55-60 degrees. i'm not sure how accurate that measurement is, as i am trying to improvise using my arms as a sort of impromptu sextant. from my point of view it was flying straight out. as it traveled at incredible speed, it seemed to passed through the cloud cover in descent, apparent because it lit them up (the clouds) in a beautiful blue glow. lost sight behind the houses and trees across the street as it traveled away and down. the whole event last between 3-4 seconds but it was one of the most beautiful sights i've ever seen in my life. it was so beautiful in fact that it has left me with a slight feeling of euphoria. it was awesome in the truest sense of the word. it was so unexpected and so fast that i didn't have a chance to take out a camera of any sort. mufon please feel free to contact me if i have left anything out. what an amazing sight. i can only hope i get to witness something like this again at some point in my life.
content.summary: Very fast bright blue, descended through cloud cover, lit up surrounding sky and clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside around 5:30 p.M., sept. 13, 2014, observing clouds, sky, and lamenting the fact that we had (and seem to always have) more chemtrails today.  as is my custom, i had my binoculars with me to track planes and birds in the area (nw gainesville, florida).

i saw a high altitude airplane spewing chemicals out its rear, though the plane itself was not that visible.  i picked up the binoculars to track it, holding steady as i attempted to follow the plane, which i could now see through the binocs.  something caught my eye in "front" of the plane but at a much lower altitude, near some lower level clouds.  it was not near the plane at all, which was going out of sight, and was at a great distance from me and the object.
  
i immediately focused on this object with the binoculars.  it seemed to be a sphere of some sort, stationary, but rapidly rotating or spinning in a counter-clockwise way, with its southern surface reflecting the sun each time it rotated.  it was not moving up or down or sideways; it was stationary. i briefly glanced away from the binoculars to see if it was visible to the naked eye.  it wasn't and i quickly went back to viewing through the binoculars, but thinking i would not see it again.  however, i did find it immediately and stayed on it, just watching through the binocs until my neck began to ache.  this had to be around five minutes or more.  all the while the object stayed in its location, spinning, reflecting the sun.  it seemed to be a brownish or coppery color - a darker color than the obvious reflection of the sun.  that reflection is what initially caught my eye.

at this point, i decided to get more comfortable in my chair and briefly sat back, without looking through the binoculars, and then attempted to resume viewing the object.  unfortunately, the object had vanished.  i could not locate it and i kept looking and looking and looking in the same area - and then moved around to a wider area, but still, no spinning object.  it was gone.

there had been no sound that i could hear.  object might have been at an altitude of commercial aircraft, maybe lower.  i simply don't know.  i do know that it could not be seen without binoculars.  object didn't seem "huge" but at that distance, i have no idea as to how large or huge it might have been.

i don't think this was a man-man object or a drone.  in fact, my area is not known to utilize drones and at that high of an altitude i'm not sure what a drone could be doing.  certainly i would have observed a drone leaving the area or moving about the area, and i didn't.  i've also not heard of drones being round or spherical in shape - and stationary.

within about five minutes or a little more after i could no longer see the spinning object, i heard a helicopter approach from the horizon west travelling to the east.  we have "life flights" in this area and i assumed that was what it was.  as the 'copter approached, and it was at a somewhat low altitude, it passed in front of me but not over me.  i had my binocs tracking it as it had approached and noticed that it was passing quite near - but certainly lower than - where the ufo had been.  as the 'copter passed in front of my position i noticed it was not a "life flight" or a news station 'copter or a private 'copter.  it was painted in a dark military green with a bit of camo color on its side. 

we do not have a military base in gainesville.  we do have a military base in jacksonville.  frankly, this is the first time i've ever seen a military helicopter in this area, though of course that doesn't mean that they don't fly over.  to me, it seemed a bit of a coincidence that i saw this unusual object and then five minutes later a military helicopter flew in the same area (but lower) than the object.

the 'copter continued to fly east and then seemed to turn off to the north.  i heard it flying about in that area - we do have an an airport in that direction, so perhaps it landed there or went on to mayport in jacksonville.

i've never seen a spinning or rotating ufo before (though at my age, i've certainly seen other anomalies in the sky both in gainesville and miami), so i thought i would report my sighting.
content.summary: Observed via binoculars a rotating or spinning sphere unseen with naked eye but viewable via binoculars, daylight hours.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to buy something for eat, when the lights out in mi town and i feeld see the sky and this object pass fastly. them it pass, the ligth came. after that my life have a some diferent acts supernatural.
content.summary: Large, blue and fast

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared quite large in sky ( 20 - 30 ft? ).. it was red with yellow light around the bottom i was driving east on patrick lane toward the intersection of eastern.. at this point i was looking across mccarran's east west runway.. object appeared to be somewhere between 4 to 8 miles off .. but still had distinct form .. as i proceeded down patrick to the intersection my view was obscured by a block wall.. as i entered the intersection i looked south and could not find the object.. i work in tv news and am used to spotting objects in the field and identifying them. i still do not know quite what this could have been ... 2 days later i fielded a call from a viewer who saw the same thing i did at almost the same time.. he was about 1/4 of the way across the valley ( 5 mi.). he described the object and location as i remembered it.
content.summary: Oval light hovering in air as observed while driving .. it was due south of the intersection of patrick and eastern.. object was obscued by block wall for 1 or 2 minuitsoculd not find it afterwards

content.detailedDescription: 3 brightly glowing orbs in a spiraling and circular path appeared and also seemed to wink in and out of sight. speeds and angles not possible for a regular aircraft or balloon. they also darted upwards a high velocity and a steep angle and seemed to be searching over an area near the rensaleer amtrack train station. i have a clear view from my office window. i called 2 of my colleagues into my office and they also saw the objects. i fist saw the objects when i looked out my window as i was about to leave for the day. it was very exciting! the objects just winked out and disappeared, but they were obviously guided by something intelligent. difficult to judge size of the objects from the distance, but i believe they were about 6 feet in diameter.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs circled and spiraled over the rensaleer amtrak train station.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home about 1855 when i pulled into my driveway. above and beyond my neighbors home i noticed a bright orb hovering. it reflected the sunset orange, and that is why i noticed it; besides it was a completely clear blue sky. i thought it could be a balloon or some sort of odd looking helicopter, but it didn't have any rotors. it appeared to have rods or antenna coming out of it. i went to my backyard to get a better view. i appeared to be less than a mile away over residences. i got my camera about 5 min later and set up my tripod. i took a few photos. then got my video camera and began to shoot video too for about 20 min. over the approx 45 mins that i watched it, there was some wavering like it was being affected by air movement. at times it would descend behind a large tree, then reappear slowly as it came out from behind the tree. the object remained relatively stable then started to slowly drift away to the sw until i couldn't see it anymore because it was too dark. i was intrigued by it. my photos showed that it indeed had 3 rods coming from it.
content.summary: Object hovered 45 min then slowly decended then headed sw

content.detailedDescription: Was in garden smoking bright light came into view from the west very bright red and green white light it stopped immediately and hovered it moved down then up back to it original position it spun around and moved very quickly towards the west there was no sound just bright lights the movement this thing made was very fluid my wife and i where baffled by what we saw it did not behave like anything that we are normally use to the thing that really sticks out is the speed and movement of direction
content.summary: Was smoking in the garden when a bright green and red object came to view in the dark sky moved quickly without sound stopped and hovered moved down then moved back up spun around and shot off quickly back in the direction it came very fluid moving

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving on i-69 going north in anderson, in.  this object was too low to be a plane and too fast to be a helicopter, it was low enough to catch our attention as it crossed our path.  we first questioned whether it was a drone, moments later we saw the dark underside of the craft and could tell that it was a disk shape, very flat.  we were excited to see our first ufo in the day time.  the craft stayed on a straight path over a field and beyond the tree line, when i lost sight.
content.summary: Flat round object flew over the highway well under cloud ceiling. appeared metallic and flying very fast.

content.detailedDescription: At around 9:50 pm i was in my front yard with my husband. due to not wanting to reveal myself, as others were present, much is left out now. i had to move towards my house a bit to see it and no one acted as though they saw it nor me looking at it.  the gap that was visible for me to see it in is about an inch to an inch and a half wide at arms length. after a minute of watching it, it only reached half way before going behind a cloud. i then stopped trying to watch it as i didn't want to discuss it with my neighbors present. so we watched tv till 12am and went to bed. at about 2:30am 9/13/14 i was rudely waken from an unusual dream but nothing scary as i felt like someone was trying to pull me out of my bed. a cold front blew in last night and i was freezing all night and wrapped up in my covers. i started trying to scream and could hear myself trying but nothing was coming out. i felt my body being slowly rolled toward the edge as i was facing my husband and the covers gradually tightening around my body as though this thing was trying to take me with my covers and like my husband was holding the covers on his side preventing me from being taken. i reached out to wake my husband feeling as though i wasn't really moving my arm but i did and i hit his pillow. at this moment it all stopped and i saw three solid balls of light in sequence move to my ceiling near a window. (green then blue and final being red) i hit his pillow again and he woke up. i began to feel embarrassed but asked him if he sees any lights. he said no and i asked again, "you didn't see any balls of light near the ceiling?". he said no again. at this time i was still seeing light residue through out my room. i got up, went to the bathroom then went to the kitchen and looked at the time to see if i could take some decongestant. so i took two and went back to bed. i continued with the same dream and woke up often after that but continuing with the same dream each time i fell back to sleep. i saw no one in my room and heard no one in my room. my dog likes to sleep on my side but this night we made him sleep in his bed due to his acting like he was going to throw up. he didn't react to anything either. i seriously want to remain anonymous due to the growing number of my sightings and i don't want to become the towns circus show. about 6 months ago, i woke up with my clothes in an odd position. i felt that someone convinced me to move them. i tried to let it go but then went outside to feed my animals and found my pond was plugged in. i had gone out several times the night before and i know that it wasn't on. even though it seemed crazy, it felt as though someone had come into my room that morning and then sat out on my porch and plugged my waterfall in to let me know that i was not imagining this. even though i couldn't even prove this to myself, i insisted that my husband bring home chain locks, then if someone entered, there would be proof as he would have to tear up the door to get in. nothing else happened till today.  about two years ago, i woke to use the rest room and felt like i had been laying on a machine or strapped to one. i could feel bar like impressions on both shoulders and running down my back in straight lines. they were not visible but felt like they were matching in length and width, feeling like an inch wide and running down to my waist line. i went back to bed and the next morning i could still feel the impressions on my body. i felt that if it was from a dream that after returning to sleep and waking back up that i would not continue feeling them, but i did. so yeah, i'm starting to feel crazy.
content.summary: Had a blue light blinking in the back, three white lights with gaps the same size as the lights in between, red light blinking in front. moved very slow in my opinion. possible failed abduction that night too.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late and i was the only one up on our second story deck near the beach.  as i often do, i was scanning the skies.  i'm a seasoned star-gazer and love to catch glimpses of meteors or just clear views of the stars (which should hopefully give this story some level of credibility).  

i turned to my right (se) and i noticed this group of lights silently floating, coming from the direction of the beach heading towards the bay. they looked similar to the brightest stars - small pinpoints of light - but obviously they were moving; "orbs" is probably the best description.  i didn't count them, but there must've been at least a dozen or so, all loosely grouped in a seemingly haphazard formation that i would estimate to be about 30 feet in diameter or so.  they were not going very fast really - i'm hesitant to estimate speeds for fear of erring, but no faster than gliding birds. they were a continuously steady light - no pulsing, no flickering, no flashing or dimming.  

my first thought was balloons with some sort of led lights attached, but several considerations make this seem unlikely: 1. they didn't randomly free drift as one might expect with wind-driven balloons, but rather all stayed in their relative positions. 2. if they were balloons, they didn't have sufficient time to gain that altitude from the beach (assuming that's where they were "launched"). 3. the wind was rather still that night, probably not sufficient to "drive" balloons horizontally like that. 4. they didn't rise, but stayed level at that relatively low elevation. 5. while it was dark, i still might expect to have seen glimpses or hints of attaching hardware - baskets, wires, etc., which i didn't.  

i curiously and intently watched these "orbs" float over the cow pasture and continue all the way over west bay.  i noted that they did not dim in brightness as they went over the complete darkness of the bay, so no measure of ground lighting was involved in illuminating them, thus ruling out any slim possibility for mistaking them as a flock of birds.  they continued on their same path until they just faded out of view due to distance.  in all, the episode was not much more than 1 minute in total.  

my immediate and lasting feeling is one of awe, curiousness, and a degree of shock and confusion. i do not claim to know what they were. nothing about their behavior really indicated any sort of intelligent purpose, but they didn't seem to fit most descriptions i've read of ball lightning. and again, i've spent countless hours under the night sky as a casual amateur astronomer; i've seen the iss, other satellites, meteors, fireballs, birds, planes & helicopters, and private drones.  these orbs looked like nothing i've ever seen.
content.summary: A dozen or more pinpoints of light, similar to and no brighter than stars, all silently floating together in a haphazard formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Around a month ago i read an article on my home homepage that i did not finish reading nor had much interest in.  but i think it said nasa scientists found 7 particles (referred to as aliens) on a satellite plate that they were examining.  i think the article said that these alien particles are on the earth.

the other day i was sitting on the ihop planter, which is a foot high, and when i looked to my left i saw coming towards me 2 16" in diameter black dots.  the one furthest from me to me left was about an inch away from the other, and about an inch behind.  they traveled at a steady pace towards me catty-corner, and were 2" from the pavement.  when they entered a shadowy area below me they disappeared like a ufo disappears into another dimension.

this sighting lasted around 10 seconds, as the objects traveled about a foot.

because of the size, shape and dark black qualities of the objects i doubt very much if it was dust or dirt on my eye lens.  when the objects disappeared i looked back in that area turning my eye, but saw nothing.
content.summary: Could have it been alien particles?

content.detailedDescription: Saw this in the sky over ottawa il on september 6 and took a picture what is it
content.summary: Saw a line of fire in sky took a pucture with iphone4 and blew it up when got home

content.detailedDescription: On july 10 2014 i took a picture of the sky after a heavy rain fall.At the time i took the picture i did not notice anything in the sky.About three weeks ago i was deleting pictures from my phone.When i got to that picture i was shocked by what i saw.There appears to be many objects in the sky with a light in the center.I don't know what to make of this.Can anyone explain this to me.
content.summary: I took a picture of the sky .I did not notice anything at the time.I'm not sure what this can be.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with sons playing then a low flying airliner moving to the southwest (was large 767 maybe). the airliner was marked in a pattern and colors that i did not recognize,,, so it caught my attention. when it moved to the 11:00 position relative to where i was standing, my sons and i saw the orbs directly above it moving in the opposite directions in a connected 2 circle pattern. the orbs then moved into a rotating pentagonal pattern with at one point two of the orbs in pentagonal formation was accompanied by a 2nd orb with one remaing orb moving from one to another of the singular orbs. the orbs were silvery white in color. it was a fantastic event!!!
content.summary: 8 orbs first in 2 circles then moved to a pentagonal pattern with one inside moving from one orb to another as the pentagonal pattern rotated and moved toward the ne gradually then suddenly elevated in altitude out of sight very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking northwards hoping to spot the aurora when i noticed two very bright stationery objects in the north, remaining stationary in the same spot in the night sky. they both seemed to pulsate, becoming extremely bright two or three times, then dimming to almost nothing. 
there was considerable commercial airline traffic in the area but these were far brighter than the planes and did not move at all. 
i got the impression of a large flat object, but that is only an impression because i did not actually see outlines with my eyes. it seemed to be staying in the same place, almost like it was monitoring the situation. 
eventually at approximately 11pm they/it became obscured by clouds.
i am surprised that nobody else has reported seeing them because i am sure many people were looking northwards, hoping to see the aurora.
content.summary: Two stationery lights looking like stars that pulsated, dimmed then brightened for hours eventually covered by clouuds

content.detailedDescription: I was outside observing morning stars; looking north i observed erratic star.  initially thought it might be a satellite but it move in a very brief straight line then abruptly shifted back then  in a blink of an eye had moved a good distance to the side.  appeared to split into two objects; lost sighting as it jumped to lower elevation behind tree line obstructing view.
content.summary: Likely occurred over columbia river and or north into washington state

content.detailedDescription: I walked over to stockdale elementary school between 9pm and 12 pm and entered the playground and sat down. my husband followed a few minutes after. out of no where a cylindar shaped ufo appeared in the sky above the playground and hovered. it was a glowing green color almost like a glow in the dark stick. a few seconds later two black helicopters followed and the ufo darted off so fast that we could no longer see it. it was amazing. i have attached a photo that resembles it most.
content.summary: Green cylindar shaped ufo seen at stockdale elementary school at night

content.detailedDescription: At 9:30 this evening i went out side to see if i could see the northern lights. it was clear and clod outside, i had on my sweats and a light hat not planning to be out long. as i walked into my front yard i immediately saw to my right hand the n.E. from where i was facing i saw a large red glowing ball in the sky that appeared as if where over the nearby cascade mountains. it looked like it was headed right toward me and as it did it was radiating a roiling effect like flames all around the outside and in the center it looked black. at this point it looked hugh like the moon but it clearly was not. at first i looked as intently as i could as i thought i was seen a meteorite burning up in the atmosphere before my very eyes! as i watched it became evident it was not moving or if it was it was heading directly towards me hiding its direction of movement from me. as i realized it was not going to "blink out" like i tough it should i ran and got my wife paula to see it to. we both watched it for a minute or two as it slowly got dimmer and them faded out. we congratulated  ourselves for seeing what we thought was a one and done event. my wife went back inside and i stepped back outside to look once more at the sky to reflect upon what we had just seen when what to my utter astonishment was to see the exact same object rising vertically into the night sky this time more to the east. as it rose i ran inside to get my wife! "its back"!! i shouted, and we both ran out side to see it again!! i simply could not believe it had returned! meteorites don't come back up in the air once they've fallen! what they hell is this we are seeing?? as we stared i ran inside and got my binoculars and ran back out. my wife was shooting video with my cell phone by now. as i looked at the object it moved erratically and was hard to fix on. at the very best i could only see what looked like a perfect round sphere of glowing light. i could not see a structured craft just the light. it was bright red with a glowing orange-ish halo to it. as we watched it, it moved around what looked like miles in the sky jumping form one point to another to quick to be seen then zooming along very fast covering greater distances in less time than any or the airplanes we watched after each sighting to compare their speed to what we saw and the planes were all slower and and straight flight paths. the red orb seamed to have no flight path until the last sighting. on this second sighting the orb faded out the very same way we first saw it do. now we are mystified will we see it again? after about 5min or so again it appeared low on the horizon moving straight up starting out small and growing in size. this time we had our camera on a tripod and we where still not ready for seeing the orb. this time it moved back and for up and down in a lurching motion. then it started moving north until like the first two times it jut faded lower and lower until it blinked out. after that it never returned. we came inside to review what we saw. i think if it was not a military drone then it is a genuine u.F.O. but i question the distances we saw it travel dozens of miles across the sky in the time it take to snap your fingers. none of the planes i've seen can move as fast as this object did. it made right angle moves while zigzagging back and forth and an odd bobbing or lurching motion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen a red orb ufo over the mountains near fall city wa

content.detailedDescription: While looking for the northern lights, i observed a flotilla of at least thirteen craft, they were very dim. i watched them for about 10 minutes, they were like a flock of birds playing in the sky. they would change the direction and there formation(s). they just kept getting dimer and dimer into the night sky, and then just faded away. i hope others have seen this and reported it also..
content.summary: Flotilla of 13 or more craft, acting like a flock of brids

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down in the middle of a soccer field watching the sky when i noticed something out the corner of my eye.  it began to be come more visible and i jumped up to get a better look at it.  it flew a straight line path and was darker in the front and gradually got lighter in the back.  it appeared to be both transparent and metallic but it is very hard to explain because i have never seen anything like it.  it was dead silent and i only saw it by absolute sheer luck.  it was huge and flying at less than 20,000 feet.  if i had to guess it was over 500 feet wide and long.  it not only appeared but also disappeared.  it was incredibly stealthy and smooth. i attached a picture that i found resembled the object i saw the most.
content.summary: U shaped object flying straight. metallic and transparent at the same time. dark to light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work/errands on rt 7 approaching exit 12 headed north towards new milford.

object was extremely bright, pulsating, couldn't help noticing.  

at 1st thought was a helicopter or low flying plane headed towards me which would explain the bright light.

decided to get off at exit and stop at light to observe.  object appeared to stay stationary and still pulsating and bright.  decided to get back on rt 7 highway extension to head towards it and get a better look.

as i drove closer to the object i rolled down my window and could see something dripping from it as it hovered over the quarry/water near the highway.  looked like molten metal, much like sparks falling from someone welding.  under the object i could clearly see several lights and some kind of shape (couldn't tell if wings or octagonal shape), so i thought it could be some kind of military or civilian aircraft, but it was so low i thought i would have heard it (even traveling at 50 mph).  i did not hear anything and could not explain the dripping material.

i had to continue on the 2 lane highway and lost site of the object.  i called my husband who was passing through shortly after me (about 10 minutes behind) and he did not see anything.  although i had trouble with my phone and bluetooth stereo which had been working fine moments earlier, i had to reset my phone in order to call him.

others on the highway slowed down too, so i'm sure others saw it too!
content.summary: Driving saw very bright light, pulsating and varying, but extremely bright.  as approached object observed appeared to be hovering and dripping molten material.

content.detailedDescription: Around 12:20 am on september 12th 2014 i was laying in bed getting ready to go to sleep when my boyfriend called to me from another room to come look out the window. i got up and went to where he was. when i looked out the window and across the lake towards kelleys island i saw an orange light that appeared to be mostly stationary and so bright it lit up the sky and clouds around it. at one point it faded out to nothing and less than a second later appeared higher and to the right of where it had been. after a while, maybe 5 minutes or so, it looked like it was slowly descending and then disappeared behind the island, like it was moving in a straight path to the north and out of our view. we continued to watch for a while afterwards but did not see it reappear.
content.summary: Bright orange light in the sky over kelleys island/lake erie

content.detailedDescription: I was working at the  airport  watching the outdoor security cameras , when a flash shot pass the cameras. i thought it was a bird but after reviewing the footage in slow motion i saw three disc flying by at a high rate of speed. they are so fast the three appeared to be one in real time. but after frame by frame footage i counted 3 crafts not one . i  recorded the footage to my cell phone and showed it to a pilot that works for united airlines he stated that he saw a disc shape object. and asked we're did you get that footage i replied from the air field. he stated i think you have something there.
content.summary: Filmed ufo flying over airport

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside backyard having a glass of wine on september 11th at approximately 12:05 when i looked up in the air i started screening because i thought it was coming to us i remember feeling nervous scared and excited all at once the object then stopped hovering making no sound and was shortly joined by 2 others also making no sound the objects then moved together brightly glowing then a series of blinking eventually the object 1 by1 became clouds right befor my eyes 1by 1 i have never seen anything like this ever
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Am not sure if this is a ufo but i want to know i have many other footage of this

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed on my pad when i noticed it out the corner of my eye! it floated through the sky and it was really bright so i quickly jumped up and took pictures and recorded it! i was excited as i knew it was different ! i know the difference between planes and helicopters and this object was definitely not either of them  or a star or a meteorite or a satellite!  i lost sight of the object when it went out of view behind the next doors house.
content.summary: Pulsatting orange orb hovering with no noise took picture and video footagep

content.detailedDescription: We went out in the pasture at about 6:00 am to walk the pups in the pre dawn moon light before going to work.  looked south to see a white fan shaped cloud emitting from an object that wasn't really very visible heading upward and to the west, then arcing and descending just a little and apparently fizzling out rather quickly.  the scene covered a small portion of the sky, but was striking and memorable.   i was delighted to see that apparently it was visible in california and nevada as reported by others earlier.   i want to more about it.
content.summary: Looked like a small comet during its last seconds.

content.detailedDescription: My work partner and i were making rounds at 6am in our truck , i was a passenger , i noticed a small red dot in the sky over lake tahoe to the south. it was like a burning ember color rather than a light. it suddenly changed to a white comet shape,similar to the hale boppe comet a few years back. by now my partner was watching it too .It changed once more , like a spotlight shining down into smoke. then while emitting a misty cloud around it , it became a large moon like white shape shrouded by mist , the mist thickened , the moon shape faded seemed to move to the south west faded more and vanished , leaving the mist for a short time before it faded away too.The sky was still dark the whole time.  we were driving down the road when i first noticed the red glow . i thought it might be a fire fighting helicopter and looked for the flashing aviation lights , there were none . my work partner is a 66 year old pilot of small aircraft . during the sighting we were driving then pulled off the road to get a better view , we lost sight of the object a couple of times because of the tall trees . we were at the ski beach boat ramp on the north shore of lake tahoe when the event ended .We looked at each other after it was gone and he said "that was a ufo " ! and i agreed !
content.summary: Red dot , white comet ,large white disk in mist over lake tahoe

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my roof deck writing, the sky was rich blue and clear. i looked up, way up, and saw something slowly passing overhead at commercial airliner altitude moving in an easterly direction. no contrail was visible. it gave off a continuous flashing, solid bright light, something you would never see on a plane during the daytime. it appeared to be rotating. when it flashed, i could make out more of its shape just before its light dimmed. it had no wings. just when i assumed it's a wayward satellite possibly spinning out of control, it suddenly turns south. it continued on for a few more seconds before instantly moving in reverse direction (north). i only saw it for about 10 seconds more before it was gone.
content.summary: Sky was blue, spotted object flying overhead, flashing light, changed direction twice.
